title: Ian McShane
summary: Ian David McShane[1] (born 29 September 1942) is an English actor.[2][3][4] He is known for his television performances, particularly as the title role in the BBC series Lovejoy (1986–1994),[5] as Al Swearengen in Deadwood (2004–2006) and its 2019 film continuation, and as Mr. Wednesday in American Gods (2017–2021). For the original series of Deadwood, McShane won the Golden Globe Award for Best Actor – Television Series Drama and received a nomination for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Drama Series; for the film, he (as producer) was nominated for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Television Movie.
